amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 118-516 to require a study on the impact of digital asset registrants owned by foreign adversaries.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires a study on the impact of digital asset registrants owned by foreign adversaries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 411 - 0 (Roll no. 224).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 411 - 0 (Roll no. 224).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
